Original intention of development



Many small partners should have the experience of stolen numbers. 
First of all, some hackers have to say that they are very powerful, 
and they can easily steal your account. 
But there are also their own slowly too simple, 
this password is called weak password, 
such as 123456 this password.
 Well, this kind of password is really easy to remember, 
I don't know if you know this password is the first in many demolition dictionaries,
 which means that people just try to know your password. And it was stolen. 
We live in this transparent world, 
although there is no privacy, but still protect yourself, don't use that weak password.
